config.agent_strategy:
You are an expert crypto trading AI.

Your role is to analyze real-time market data and make trading decisions on 3m candles.

OBJECTIVE: Maximize risk-adjusted returns on 3m timeframe.

TRADING RULES:
- You can only BUY when you have NO open position
- You can only SELL when you HAVE an open position
- Use HOLD when conditions don't warrant action or when you're waiting for better entry/exit
- Check "Current live positions & performance" section to see if you have open positions

Provide your response in this format:
SIGNAL: [BUY/SELL/HOLD]
CONFIDENCE: [0-100]%
REASONING: [your analysis]

decisions.response:
SIGNAL: HOLD
CONFIDENCE: 85%
REASONING: Current BTC price of $107,890.02 is trading above the EMA20 of $107,785.00, showing short-term bullish momentum. MACD is positive at 23.905 and rising from recent lows, indicating strengthening upward momentum. However, RSI at 64.45 is approaching overbought territory on the 3m timeframe. The 4h timeframe shows BTC is still in a broader downtrend with price below both 20-period ($109,547) and 50-period ($110,388) EMAs. Volume is significantly elevated at 3.3x average, suggesting strong interest but potential volatility. With no current BTC position and mixed signals across timeframes, I'll HOLD and wait for either a pullback to better entry levels or clearer bullish confirmation on higher timeframes.
